DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose TKA Randomized Clinical Trial- Cemented versus Cementless Tibial Prosthesis Study determine whether significant difference patient-reported measured clinical outcome ( e.g . pain , function , length recovery , patient satisfaction ) subject treated cementless tibial prosthesis ( cementless group ) treat cemented tibial prosthesis ( cement group ) first two postoperative year . Radiographs assess surgery establish post-operative interval determine significant difference patient two group assess influence component fixation radiographic stability time . Complication revision rate also assess comparison .
DOC.brief_title: Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA ) Cemented Versus Cementless Tibial Prosthesis Study
DOC.criteria: BMI le < 35 Normal neurological function Primary total knee arthroplasty ( Pre operative Medial Knee Patient ) Patient age ≤ 70 year old Revision surgery History joint sepsis Recent systemic corticosteroid ( < 2 month prior procedure ) Primary secondary carcinoma last five year Post operative renal transplant Psychosocial disorder limit rehabilitation Previous intraarticular knee fracture Over 20° valgus varus deformity Extension loss 20° Unsuitable cruciate substitute arthroplasty Unsuitable cementless fixation tibial component Need augmentation wedge bone graft Previous proximal tibial osteotomy
